about_the_game:
This is the first chapter of the Timestamps Visual Novel series where the adventure begins. Things are simple but awesome. You’ve got a girlfriend that would do anything for you and and a best friend that you know has your back. Great right? Well it's summer break and your genius best friend kinda threw everything you know out the window. Big-time. He's been up to something crazy in his basement, and he's finally ready to let you in on the secret. A time machine....and it changed everything!

You live in Cougar Valley surrounded by incredibly beautiful women. You will have to make decisions to reveal the secrets of your closest friends, and to discover the darker and more playful side of the valley's finest women. More things are going on than meets the eye. Who is playing both sides? Who are those mysterious men behind the curtains? This world is yours to discover.
Do you have what it takes to be immersed into a world full of sex, mystery and suspense?


Timestamps: Unconditional love is an adult Visual Novel featuring:
  • Over 4200 High Quality images and more than 140 animations.
  • Around 8-12+ hours of gameplay.
  • Mood-fitting music tracks and sound effects.
  • Plenty of fun references and easter eggs.
  • Comedy, Sci-fi and a darker deep story. There is more than meets the eye.


This is the first chapter of the Timestamps Series, Unconditional Love which was originally released in 2019. Timestamps is a popular series of Adult Visual Novel Games developed by a very small indie team as a passion project for the last few years. By popular demand we've finally been able to release this technically remastered version of the first chapter to bring you a very much improved experience, with the improved performance and features of Chapter 2. We also included some completely new features into this special version for you all to enjoy! Chapter 2 is currently still in development and will also be released on Steam once completed.

content_descriptors.notes:
The game contains mature language and frequent graphic depictions of sexual activity, including oral, vaginal, anal and other sexual activity. Be advised that the game can also depict frequent smoking (Option exists to have significantly reduced), occasional use of alcohol, violence, non-consensual sexual acts, blood and gore. The game may also mention sexual violence and drug use. 

Viewer discretion is advised.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 15
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mojave
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Timestamps: Unconditional Love

pc_requirements.recommended:

short_description: An exciting adult Visual Novel with a unique intriguing story featuring Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Romance, Sex, Humour, Character Development and some fun references.
